description: Creamy ricotta and earthy mushrooms make a rich filling for this simple puff pastry tart.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Baking,Spinach,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Mushroom, Thyme & Ricotta Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the mushrooms for 8 minutes. Add the spinach and cook for 1-2 minutes to wilt. Stir in the garlic, nutmeg and thyme and cook for 1 minute.
Place the ricotta in a bowl and stir in the mushroom and spinach mix. Place the puff pastry sheet on a lined baking sheet and score a border around the edge.
Spoon the ricotta mixture inside the border and spread evenly. Brush the border with milk and bake for 15 minutes, until golden. Scatter with rocket and serve.
